question: How many days of medical leave do I have?
answer: All staff are entitled to 14 days of medical leave.

answer: All staff are entitled to 14 days of medical leave.

question: Can I claim medical expenses from a TCM doctor?
answer: Please note that Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) treatments are NOT claimable.

answer: Please note that Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) treatments are NOT claimable.
